page.title: 18Trade and Industry
page.content: Two of Halifax's main industries were {textiles and machine tool production. Both have declined considerably due to competition from overseas.The{carpet {industries}were well known but have declined in the last decade.{Sweet and {biscuit manufacturing}are two main industries.e.g.Rowntree Mackintosh. A lot of Halifax's modern industries are {small businesses}which have been encouraged to develop.These are based in the redundant mills of the declining industries. Halifax town centre has just got a new shopping centre called{Woolshops built after much discussion with conservation groups and the council. They were designed like the surrounding Victorian architecture to preserve Halifax as a "Heritage Town".
